# Copilot Instructions for Digital Rishabh Portfolio

- Stack: Vite + React 18 + React Router 6 + Tailwind; single-page app with animated page transitions. Vite config in [vite.config.js](../vite.config.js) sets base `/` and raises chunk warning.
- Local dev: `npm install` then `npm run dev`; `npm run build` for production, `npm run lint` uses eslint react rules. Env vars required in `.env(.local)`: VITE_GEMINI_API_KEY and Firebase keys per [README.md](../README.md).
- Routing/layout: Routes defined in [src/App.jsx](../src/App.jsx) using `AnimatePresence`; pages wrapped with [src/components/shared/PageWrapper.jsx](../src/components/shared/PageWrapper.jsx) for transitions. Layout shell (Navbar/CustomCursor/Footer) in [src/components/layout/Layout.jsx](../src/components/layout/Layout.jsx).
- Theme system: [src/components/shared/ThemeContext.jsx](../src/components/shared/ThemeContext.jsx) toggles `light` vs default dark; persists in `localStorage` (`portfolio_theme`) and drives CSS variables defined in [src/index.css](../src/index.css). Use semantic colors (primary/secondary/accent/fun-pink/fun-yellow) instead of hardcoded values.
- Retro/Easter eggs: Konami code hook in [src/hooks/useKonamiCode.js](../src/hooks/useKonamiCode.js) toggles `retro-mode` class (persisted via `konami-mode` localStorage) and styles in [src/index.css](../src/index.css). Notification UI in [src/components/shared/KonamiNotification.jsx](../src/components/shared/KonamiNotification.jsx).
- Chatbot: [src/components/shared/Chatbot.jsx](../src/components/shared/Chatbot.jsx) uses Gemini via [src/services/ai.js](../src/services/ai.js) with model `gemini-2.5-flash`; injects `SYSTEM_PROMPT` built from [src/data/resume.js](../src/data/resume.js). Chat history persisted in `localStorage` (`portfolio_chat_history`); limits context to last 30 messages. Missing/blocked API key returns friendly errors. Links rendered safely with ReactMarkdown.
- Roast mode: [src/components/shared/RoastMode.jsx](../src/components/shared/RoastMode.jsx) calls `roastResume()` from `ai.js`; shares API key requirement and leak-handling messaging.
- Data sources: Resume content lives only in [src/data/resume.js](../src/data/resume.js) and powers Hero/Resume/SEO and chatbot prompts. Projects and languages derive from the same file; update here for site-wide changes.
- Blog feed: Static data in [src/data/blogs.json](../src/data/blogs.json) generated by [scripts/sync-blogs.js](../scripts/sync-blogs.js) which pulls Dev.to, Medium, Substack (with optional ID mappings in [scripts/substack-mapping.js](../scripts/substack-mapping.js)); run via `node scripts/sync-blogs.js` and commit the regenerated JSON.
- Gemini tooling: [scripts/list-models.js](../scripts/list-models.js) lists available models using `GEMINI_API_KEY`. Current production model is gemini-2.5-flash; keep secrets HTTP-referrer restricted as noted in README.
- SEO: Each page sets `<Helmet>` metadata (title/description/canonical) using resume data (see [Hero.jsx](../src/components/home/Hero.jsx), [Projects.jsx](../src/components/pages/Projects.jsx), [Blog.jsx](../src/components/pages/Blog.jsx), [Resume.jsx](../src/components/pages/Resume.jsx), [Contact.jsx](../src/components/pages/Contact.jsx)). Maintain canonical URLs when adding routes.
- UX patterns: Navbar and Chatbot coordinate via custom DOM events (`closeChatbot`, `closeMobileMenu`) to avoid overlapping UI; preserve when adding overlays. Custom cursor in [src/components/shared/CustomCursor.jsx](../src/components/shared/CustomCursor.jsx) hides native cursor on pointer devices; avoid applying `cursor` styles that break its logic.
- Styling: Tailwind theme is driven by CSS variables; prefer utility classes referencing theme colors. Retro mode overrides borders/radius; be cautious with hardcoded rounded/border styles if you want retro compatibility.
- Accessibility: Skip link in Layout, focus trapping in Chatbot, `sr-only` utilities in [src/index.css](../src/index.css), throttled scroll-to-top button in [src/components/shared/ScrollToTop.jsx](../src/components/shared/ScrollToTop.jsx); keep focus states and aria labels when modifying interactive components.
- Deployment: Target is GitHub Pages. Secrets map to VITE_* envs for Gemini and Firebase (see README). Ensure keys are domain-restricted to avoid leak blocking by Google API.
- Animations: Framer Motion used widely (page transitions, navbar, Hero, cards). Maintain `AnimatePresence` keys when adding routes to avoid stale exits.
- Games page: Arcade widgets under [src/components/games](../src/components/games) for Snake/TicTacToe; keep self-contained to avoid polluting global state.
- If adding new data-driven sections, consider centralizing content in `src/data` and reusing existing SEO/animation patterns rather than hardcoding strings in components.
